sec.p: Bounding box for covered area: 36°52’12”N and 37°15’36”N Latitude; 3°41’24”W and 2°33’36”W Longitude
Temporal coverage: Observations in the collection included in this data paper date from March 2008 to April 2015 (Figure 4).

div.p: Temporal coverage of the dataset. For each taxon (y-axis) the temporal coverage is shown including a point. Point size is proportional to monthly records of each taxon.

sec.p: Collection name: Dataset of Passerine bird communities in a Mediterranean high mountain (Sierra Nevada, Spain)
